mapper.sql: select REPORT_ID, RESOLVE_ID,REPORT_LEVEL, YEAR, PROVINCE,CITY, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_ID,MAP_ID, TIME_SCALE, JM_SIZE, JM_MONEY, XM_SIZE, XM_MONEY, HQLX_SIZE, HQLX_MONEY, SMHZL_SIZE, SMHZL_MONEY, THCYGL_SIZE, THCYGL_MONEY, RGSCD_SIZE, RGSCD_MONEY, HSPJ_SIZE, HSPJ_MONEY, HTT_SIZE, HTT_MONEY, DHC_SIZE, DHC_MONEY, YKCYZL_SIZE, YKCYZL_MONEY, ZY_MONEY, DF_MONEY, START_TIME, END_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, STATUS, DEL_STATUS, AUDIT_ID, AUDIT_NAME, AUDIT_TIME,CONCRETE_TIME, AUDIT_STATUS from t_task_report

SELECT REPORT_ID, RESOLVE_ID,REPORT_LEVEL, YEAR, PROVINCE,CITY, ADDRESS,MAP_ID,TIME_SCALE,CONCRETE_TIME, ifnull( JM_SIZE, '0' ) AS JM_SIZE, ifnull( JM_MONEY, '0' ) AS JM_MONEY, ifnull( XM_SIZE, '0' ) AS XM_SIZE, ifnull( XM_MONEY, '0' ) AS XM_MONEY, ifnull( HQLX_SIZE, '0' ) AS HQLX_SIZE, ifnull( HQLX_MONEY, '0' ) AS HQLX_MONEY, ifnull( RGSCD_SIZE, '0' ) AS RGSCD_SIZE, ifnull( RGSCD_MONEY, '0' ) AS RGSCD_MONEY, ifnull( HSPJ_SIZE, '0' ) AS HSPJ_SIZE, ifnull( HSPJ_MONEY, '0' ) AS HSPJ_MONEY, ifnull( ZY_MONEY, '0' ) AS ZY_MONEY, ifnull( DF_MONEY, '0' ) AS DF_MONEY, ifnull( SMHZL_SIZE, '0' ) AS SMHZL_SIZE, ifnull( SMHZL_MONEY, '0' ) AS SMHZL_MONEY, ifnull( THCYGL_SIZE, '0' ) AS THCYGL_SIZE, ifnull( THCYGL_MONEY, '0' ) AS THCYGL_MONEY, ifnull( HTT_SIZE, '0' ) AS HTT_SIZE, ifnull( HTT_MONEY, '0' ) AS HTT_MONEY, ifnull( YKCYZL_SIZE, '0' ) AS YKCYZL_SIZE, ifnull( YKCYZL_MONEY, '0' ) AS YKCYZL_MONEY, ifnull( DHC_SIZE, '0' ) AS DHC_SIZE, ifnull( DHC_MONEY, '0' ) AS DHC_MONEY FROM t_task_report
mapper.select: WHERE YEAR = #{year} and ADDRESS = #{address} and TIME_SCALE = 'å¹´'

SELECT PROVINCE FROM t_task_report
PROVINCE = #{province} and RESOLVE_ID is not null GROUP BY PROVINCE
SELECT year,sum(ZY_MONEY) as ZY_MONEY FROM t_task_report WHERE PROVINCE = #{province}
SELECT sum(RGSCD_SIZE) as RGSCD_SIZE FROM t_task_report WHERE PROVINCE = #{province} and YEAR = '2019' and RESOLVE_ID is null

select province,sum(JM_SIZE) as JM_SIZE,sum(XM_SIZE) as XM_SIZE,sum(HQLX_SIZE) as HQLX_SIZE,sum(SMHZL_SIZE) as SMHZL_SIZE from t_task_report
and PROVINCE = #{province} GROUP BY province

SELECT SUM(ifnull(JM_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(XM_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HQLX_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(SMHZL_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(THCYGL_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(RGSCD_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HSPJ_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HTT_SIZE,'0'))+SUM(ifnull(DHC_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(YKCYZL_SIZE,'0')) as JM_SIZE, SUM(ifnull(JM_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(XM_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HQLX_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(SMHZL_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(THCYGL_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(RGSCD_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HSPJ_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HTT_MONEY,'0'))+SUM(ifnull(DHC_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(YKCYZL_MONEY,'0')) as JM_MONEY FROM t_task_report WHERE ADDRESS in ( SELECT dict_label FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_parent in ( SELECT dict_code FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_label = #{dictLabel})) and `YEAR`= #{year} and `STATUS` in (SELECT `STATUS` from t_task_report WHERE `STATUS`='1' or `STATUS`='3' or `STATUS`='4')

SELECT SUM(ifnull(JM_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(XM_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HQLX_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(SMHZL_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(THCYGL_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(RGSCD_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HSPJ_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HTT_SIZE,'0'))+SUM(ifnull(DHC_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(YKCYZL_SIZE,'0')) as JM_SIZE, SUM(ifnull(JM_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(XM_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HQLX_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(SMHZL_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(THCYGL_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(RGSCD_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HSPJ_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HTT_MONEY,'0'))+SUM(ifnull(DHC_MONEY,'0'))+sum(ifnull(YKCYZL_MONEY,'0')) as JM_MONEY FROM t_task_report WHERE ADDRESS in ( SELECT dict_label FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_parent in( SELECT dict_code FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_parent in ( SELECT dict_code FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_label = #{dictLabel}))) and `YEAR`= #{year} and STATUS = '4'

SELECT SUM(ifnull(JM_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(XM_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HQLX_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(SMHZL_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(THCYGL_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(RGSCD_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HSPJ_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HTT_SIZE,'0'))+SUM(ifnull(DHC_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(YKCYZL_SIZE,'0')) as JM_SIZE FROM t_task_report WHERE YEAR = #{year} and PROVINCE = #{province} and ADDRESS = #{address} and STATUS = '1'

SELECT SUM(ifnull(JM_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(XM_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HQLX_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(SMHZL_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(THCYGL_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(RGSCD_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HSPJ_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(HTT_SIZE,'0'))+SUM(ifnull(DHC_SIZE,'0'))+sum(ifnull(YKCYZL_SIZE,'0')) as JM_SIZE FROM t_task_report WHERE YEAR = #{year} and PROVINCE = #{province} and ADDRESS = #{address} and STATUS = '4'
WHERE REPORT_LEVEL = '1' AND DEL_STATUS = '1' AND RESOLVE_ID = #{resolveId}
WHERE REPORT_LEVEL = '0' AND DEL_STATUS = '1' AND RESOLVE_ID = #{resolveId}

SELECT SUM( ifnull( JM_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS JM_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( JM_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS JM_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( XM_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS XM_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( XM_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS XM_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( HQLX_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS HQLX_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( HQLX_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS HQLX_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( RGSCD_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS RGSCD_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( RGSCD_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS RGSCD_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( HSPJ_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS HSPJ_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( HSPJ_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS HSPJ_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( ZY_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS ZY_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( DF_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS DF_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( SMHZL_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS SMHZL_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( SMHZL_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS SMHZL_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( THCYGL_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS THCYGL_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( THCYGL_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS THCYGL_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( HTT_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS HTT_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( HTT_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS HTT_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( YKCYZL_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS YKCYZL_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( YKCYZL_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS YKCYZL_MONEY, SUM( ifnull( DHC_SIZE, '0' ) ) AS DHC_SIZE, SUM( ifnull( DHC_MONEY, '0' ) ) AS DHC_MONEY FROM t_task_report WHERE REPORT_LEVEL = '0' AND DEL_STATUS = '1' AND STATUS = '1' AND RESOLVE_ID = #{resolveId}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_task_report
RESOLVE_ID, REPORT_LEVEL, YEAR, PROVINCE, CITY, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_ID, MAP_ID,
TIME_SCALE, JM_SIZE, JM_MONEY, XM_SIZE, XM_MONEY, HQLX_SIZE, HQLX_MONEY, SMHZL_SIZE, SMHZL_MONEY, THCYGL_SIZE, THCYGL_MONEY, RGSCD_SIZE, RGSCD_MONEY, HSPJ_SIZE, HSPJ_MONEY, HTT_SIZE, HTT_MONEY, DHC_SIZE, DHC_MONEY, YKCYZL_SIZE, YKCYZL_MONEY, ZY_MONEY, DF_MONEY, START_TIME, END_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, STATUS, DEL_STATUS, AUDIT_ID, AUDIT_NAME, AUDIT_TIME, CONCRETE_TIME, AUDIT_STATUS,
#{resolveId}, #{reportLevel}, #{year}, #{province}, #{city}, #{address}, #{addressId}, #{mapId},
#{timeScale}, #{jmSize}, #{jmMoney}, #{xmSize}, #{xmMoney}, #{hqlxSize}, #{hqlxMoney}, #{smhzlSize}, #{smhzlMoney}, #{thcyglSize}, #{thcyglMoney}, #{rgscdSize}, #{rgscdMoney}, #{hspjSize}, #{hspjMoney}, #{httSize}, #{httMoney}, #{dhcSize}, #{dhcMoney}, #{ykcyzlSize}, #{ykcyzlMoney}, #{zyMoney}, #{dfMoney}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{status}, #{delStatus}, #{auditId}, #{auditName}, #{auditTime}, #{concreteTime}, #{auditStatus},
